TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_pitudung, title = pitudung, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/pitudung} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:要去學) pitudung tu kapahayay a wayway. 要學習好的行為.
(kamo no holam:要去學) pitodong to kapahayay a wayway. 要學習好的行為.
